Iingcebiso Ngokufaka Ithenda





UBUME

IINKONZO



USHICILELO



IZIXHOBO



UQHAGAMSHELWANO




uSeptemba 2005

iCandelo Elijongene Nokuthatyathwa Kwenxaxheba Kuqoqosho (Department of Economic Development and Tourism, uRhulumente Wephondo leNtshona Kapa)



ISISHWANKATHELO

Olu xwebhu luqulethe iingcebiso ezisuka kumagosa asebenza kaRhulumente wePhondo asebenza ngeethenda, ngcebiso ezo zikunika amacebo okuphucula amathuba akho okukhuphisana ngeethenda zikarhulumente ngempumelelo.





Ezi zilandelayo ziimpazamo ezenziwa rhoqo xa kufakwa iithenda:

1. Nikezela ngazo zonke iinkcukacha ezifunwa seso sicelo sethenda ngawo onke amaxesha. Ungazilibali izinto ezifana nesiqinisekiso sakho sokuhlanjwa kwirhafu kwakunye neziqinisekiso zabanini beshishini elo lakho. Qwalasela: iziqinisekiso zokuhlanjwa kwirhafu eziphelelwe lixesha nazo azamkelekanga.
2. Kubalulekile ke ukuba izibalo zamaxabiso eethenda abe achanekile. jonga ze UJONGISISE oku!
3. Amaxesha amaninzi, abafaki-zicelo zeethenda baye bangabuqondi kakuhle ubuzaza bomsebenzi. Ukuba kukho nantoni na ongaqinisekanga ngayo kuloo thenda, BUZA!
4. LUTYIKITYE rhoqo uxwebhu lwakho lwethenda. Amaxwebhu eethenda angatyikitywanga awaphendulwa yaye yaye aya kukhatyelwa ngaphandle.
5. Ukuba uyi-HDI, khumbula ukwenza ibango lamanqaku akho. Amanqaku angafakelwanga bango ayalahleka!
6. Qinisekisa ukuba ufaka isicelo sakho sethenda kwibhokisi echanekileyo, phambi komhla wokuvalwa. Ngokomthetho, iithenda ezingene emva kwexesha aziyi kwamkelwa, nokuba sezisemva kwexesha ngomzuzwana omnye.
7. Ukuba kuye kwacelwa imizekelo, kufuneka kunikezelwe ngenani elaneleyo ukuze ithenda nganye ibe nokuvanywa phantsi kwemiqathango eyiyo yobugcisa neyaseklinikhi. Qinisekisa ke kwakho ukuba naziphi na iimfuno ezinento yokwenza nokumelana nemigangatho yeSABS iyagfikeleleka.

Iingcebiso ezisuka kumagosa asebenza ngeethenda:

1. Fundisisa kakuhle onke amaxwebhu ethenda ngawo onke amaxesha.
2. Gcwalisa olu xwebhu ngokugcweleyo.
3. Yenza uvavanyo lwamaxabiso oluchanekileyo xa ubala amaxabiso akho aloo thenda. Amaxabiso eethenda abalwe aphezulu kakhulu okanye asezantsi kakhulu athatyathwa njengangayiboni kakuhle le thenda.
4. Buza ngaloo thenda ze ufumane zonke iinkcukacha ngayo phambi kokuba ugcwalise uxwebhu lwayo.
5. Uze ungoyiki ukubuza ukuba kutheni na ungakhange uphumelele kwithenda ethile ukuze ube nokufunda kwiimpazamo ozenzileyo.
6. Qinisekisa ukuba uyamelana nazo zonke iimfuno ngexesha elichanekileyo yaye uyakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wakho xa sithe saphumelela isicelo sakho.
7. Uze ungaphosisi okanye wenze izithembiso neentetho ezingeyonyaniso kuxwebu lwakho lwesicelo sethenda. Olu luxwebhu lomthetho yaye luyanyanzeliseka ngokomthetho.
8. Ukunikezela iinkonzo neemveliso ezisemgangathweni kuya kuphucula igama lakho yaye uya kuba mhle kwiincwadi zelo sebe. Ukuza neenkonzo neemveliso ezingekho mgangathweni kukunika igama elibi hayi kwisihishini lakho nje kuphela kodwa kuwo onke amashishini asakhasayo.
